txt.en: 'Someone shut off that light! I'm trying to sleep here.'\n\nWhat a disgrace. You should make sure Amaranth Goldworthy gets out of sight before people start getting offended by her public display of drunkenness.
'Up we go! La, la. Oh, hello there!'
Designated Escort: A Disturbance in Woodhall
A member of the Inn League seems to have landed drunk in the fair town in Woodhall, where everyone can see her. Shameful!
Surely Amaranth did not go as far away as you intended, but at least she is out of sight
You left Amaranth Goldworthy to make a fool of herself
Escort the drunken hobbit out of this public place
Amaranth Goldworthy is the disgrace of Waymeet.\n\nYou should escort the drunken hobbit to a secluded place where she won't be disturbing the good-mannered folk around town.
Escort the drunken hobbit out of this public place
Amaranth Goldworthy is the disgrace of Waymeet.\n\nYou should escort the drunken hobbit to a secluded place where she won't be disturbing the good-mannered folk around town.
